content.question: Federal budget deficits occur when

choices.label: more money is being spent on entitlement programs than has been allocated
the Internal Revenue Service spends more than it collects in taxes in a given year
the federal government spends more than it collects in taxes in a given year
high levels of unemployment use up tax collections
interest payments on the national debt increase from one year to the next

content.answer: the federal government spends more than it collects in taxes in a given year

topic.text: 5.4: Government Deficits and the National Debt
